title: Zyra and Jhin skin idea. *Circus Gimmick*
body:
Lion Tamer Zyra/Killer Clown Jhin
Zyra ~Cannon Plants ~ ~Whips for thorns ~ ~Recall can be fire whips and tricks~ ~Warm colors~ ~Ult can be colorful circus tent swirl~ *The rest 
clueless* 
Jhin ~Circus tent spin E~ ~Guns ranging from water guns to anything random. ~Recall or taunt can be random stuff like flowers coming out. The Clown agenda would still cover his face. 
(So far what I've thought of)
